A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The best and most innovative Star Wars movie yet. I'm a fan of the franchise but I can't deny that all of the previous films follow very similar story beats. This one does something different by subverting expectations and telling a story about the consequences (both positive and negative) of expectations and blind belief. The acting is great\, the action and SFX are outstanding and I was absolutely thrilled by it.
